data.title: Person: Timothy Dalton
data.meta_description: Person: Timothy Dalton: A comprehensive series of articles on this topic
data.text:
Reeve Carney is to play Jeff Buckley, who drowned in 1997, in a planned biopic, says Richard Fitzpatrick

U2 took over the seafront in Bray, Co Wicklow for the last few days — filming what many believe is the cover for their new album.

California resident Ryan Kraft was given a stark warning by the Lanza family when he used to babysit Adam Lanza.

Were it not for the introduction of de rigueur 3D, this fourth computer-animated feature based on JM Barrie’s scantily-clad fairy would surely have fluttered straight to DVD.

Time waits for no man, not even the suave and sharply attired 007.

Daniel Craig is the James Bond actor most married women want to have an affair with.

Mel Gibson used some lightning legal moves to abruptly end a domestic violence case involving a fight last year with his then-girlfriend.

Oksana Grigorieva didn’t think she would “make it through the night” if she stayed with Mel Gibson.

Oksana Grigorieva has been left “scared to death” by threatening phone calls, according to online reports.

Mel Gibson knocked his ex-girlfriend’s teeth out during a violent row, it has been claimed.

Mel Gibson allegedly cheated on ex-girlfriend Oksana Grigorieva while she was pregnant with their daughter.

News that Bond is being put on hold has sparked concern about Daniel Craig’s future.

Mel Gibson’s ex-girlfriend insists the pair will continue to be doting parents to their daughter despite their recent split.

'Doctor Who' star David Tennant said he and former 'James Bond' actor Timothy Dalton showed their mutual respect by breaking into a singsong of each other’s theme tunes.

Mel Gibson is an “incredible” and “hands-on” father to his new baby daughter.

Mel Gibson’s girlfriend is confident he will never cheat on her.

Mel Gibson has become a father for the eighth time.

Simon Pegg is expected to play a mass murderer in a new movie.

AUTHOR Sebastian Faulks has admitted he found it a challenge to write a new James Bond story.

Super big-city cop Pegg, so good his colleagues are embarrassed at his success, is sent into exile in a backwater rural village where murders are overtaking the excitement of flower shows.

A fleet of police motorcycles escorted the British stars of new movie Hot Fuzz to the film’s premiere in London.

English actor Daniel Craig has vowed to be the "baddest" James Bond in the history of the film franchise.

The new James Bond hasn’t even had his first martini yet and he’s already got another job, according to reports in the US.

James Bond producers have refused to comment on reports that British actor Daniel Craig will be the next 007.

Hollywood star Liam Neeson turned down the chance to play James Bond, because he has never been interested in starring in action movies.

THE annual Canon Hayes National Sports Awards in Tipperary will incorporate a new category this year in memory of the late international rugby player and coach, Mick Doyle.

Plans for James Bond’s next mission have been delayed by a year because movie-makers are still searching for a new secret agent.
